metadata.title: The Dawn of a New Era

tracks.text: Title card depicting sandwhiches. Text, The Dawn of a New Era
Characters shimmer. Text, The Dawn of the Age of Great Exploration

The entrance to the Great Labyrinth sits at the base of a cone shaped mountain. A wooden fence surrounds the mountain in a circle. Beyond the fence, many red roofed buildings stand in clusters, forming streets and alleys. A stone, crenellated wall encircles them. Crowds gather in front of the stone wall's entrance.

Adventurers mill about. Merchants sit on cloths with wares. Horses draw carriages. A woman sells baked goods at a stall. A man walks away, eating bread.  A stall has a sign reading Kingdom Run Great Labyrinth. It sells merchandise, including pictures of the mountain, plushies, and branded axes and daggers.
A guard at the entrance drops a coin in a chest
Flashback, the roomba breaks free of Saitou's grasp and scurries away
Saitou looks around
Raelza glances at him
Cainz throws up his hand dramatically, pushing his cape aside. He wears the Hero's Sword at his belt. He bows dramatically, in a Western style.
A crowd passes between them
They sparkle and pose. Saito's group stare.
hands reach out
The blond elf
He sweats. A pointed tack is taped to his palm.
People lie on the ground, rigid
Monpui sweats profusely
The king's minister carries a golden scepter. He walks with the Golden Knight, who carries a monster head
The pair walk between the elf and Saito's party
golden pair
Text, Handyman Saito in Another World
Characters swell. Text, The strongest party.
The golden pair sit around a camp fire in the woods.
Minister holds meat over the fire
His eyes bulge and he drops his meat
A sword sticks out of his chest. Blood spreads across his robe. The sword withdraws and he topples
The dark ninja drops onto a rock. The Golden Knight grabs his sword.
Horns erupt from the helmet, and the Golden Knight's face transforms into the 7 eyed demon king
The ninja strikes, cutting the demon king's face in half
Dialog in the style of a 90's RPG for kids reads, The Man Clad in Black Attacks. 8 Hits deal 559 damage. The Former Demon King dies.
The ninja slices the face a dozen times. The chunks of face and blood scatter and fall.
a chubby, black winged fairy
Castle
King looks at minister
Lines cut across the demon king's face
Minister bows and walks away. King rests his face in his hand.
He sinks into his throne
Text, Former Demon King and Court Magician Team, Dropped Out
Diagram of characters with roles and levels. Golden Knight and Minister are marked "Retired". Power wizard marked "not participating"
Text, The reason why the power wizard is not participating
The power wizard looks at the shoulder-width pathway. He walks forward, carrying his staff.
The end of the staff is wider than the pathway. The staff is longer than the corridor.
The wizard leaves.
Text, He gave up and quickly left
Text, A party divided
In the dungeon, Morlock wields a staff against a 5 foot high turtle breathes green gas
The gas dissipates and Morlock sleeps standing up
Raelza wields a sword. The turtle charges
She side steps. She swings, and the turtle retracts into its shell. Her sword bounces off.
She jumps back. The turtle turns and charges.
She blocks its head with her shield. The turtle pushes her back.
Saito pushes Morlock. The turtle shoves Raelza back.
A spinning blade drives into the turtle shell
The teenage girl swings her giant axe onto the shell. Dark ichor oozes. The turtle roars, revealing dinosaur style teeth
The burly man runs up
Guivre nods
Saito pulls out lock picks
He moves the picks in the lock. Liliza, Guivre, and Raelza watch. A propped up torch shines light. Liliza blinks and stares.
out loud
Raelza pulls back her visor
Guivre looks away and clamps his mouth
Saito proffers blue, glittering jewels. Guivre blushes.
In Guivre's eyes, a heart forms around Saito's face. He floats in an aura of pink sparkles and bubbles
Text, It wasn't just the treasure chest that Saito opened. The doors to Guivre's heart opened, too!
In her helmet, Raelza narrows her eyes
Characters drift away. Text, a man who is needed and a man who is not
Saito walks down the a dungeon passage
Text, Saito has gotten separated from his party
Saito carries a torch. He stops and looks ahead. Monpui looks around, a glowing orb over his shoulder.
Monpui turns
Saito removes his bag
Saito raises an eyebrow
Monpui throws his bags down and conjures a tight cylinder around him
Saito goes to his bag and pulls out a rope with 4 canisters
He pours water in a circle around him
He completes the circle, and a cylinder forms around him
The torch burns
Monpui pulls out a bag and faces away
He glances over his shoulder
Lettuce peaks between sandwich bread slices
Tears well in Monpui's eyes
Characters converge. Text, A Duel!
In front of a treasure chest, a 15 foot tall, 6 legged spider pushes Raelza back
The spider raises a leg and swings its 3 foot talon. Raelza leaps back and swings her sword, cutting off the talon.
The spider steps back
Her view is blocked by the blond elf, who leaps above the spider and stabs the middle of its 3 eyes.
The elf leaps away as the spider lurches and collapses in green, oozing blood.
Text, and thus, it became a duel
Red haired priest
Nina and Lafa face
They draw symbols in the air
The symbol rises and dissipates
Flanlil readies her gauntlets. Raelza readies her sword.
Flanlil darts and slices at Raelza's shoulder and leaps back. Raelza swings, much too short.
Raelza swings repeatedly. Flanlil dodges and side steps. She grits her teeth and darts in, sliding under the swinging blade.
Flanlil draws blood.
Flanlil leaps up before Raelza swings. Flanlil drops and strikes Raelza's arm and waist
Raelza plants her long sword in the ground, draws daggers. She removes her shoulder plates, helmet, and chest plate.
Her hair unfurls. She stands, wearing a leather, laced up tunic.
Text, armor activated, Raelza light armor
The laces on her shoulder and down the front of her tunic break and unwind. Her breasts bounce in their newfound freedom.
She covers her bare chest and drops to the ground.
Saito sweats and stiffens. Text, Sometimes Saito fails at the very end.
Flanlil and Ninia stand together around the corner.
Flanlil blushes
Ninia drops her staff and embraces Flanlil
Flanlil slowly takes Ninia in her arms then turns
Saito holds the chest
Text, Sometimes, Saito has awkward timing
Characters get sucked together. Text, the vacuum and the assassin
Text, Saitou and the others reached the lower floors
Saito's party walks along a narrow passage. Up ahead, a roomba scurries around.
It scurries into the darkness
Saito runs
Saito shimmies through a narrow crevice and stares around a large cavern
A japanese post box. A bicycle. A fish trawler. A semi truck. A totem pole. A luxury 1930's car. A temple's komainu statue. A steam train engine. Utility poles. A free standing sign reading "Diner"
The fairy Primasse shines a light
He covers his eyes
The blinding light casts long shadows across the rock floor.
Kisurugi wields blades
Raelza blocks Kisurugi. Saitou falls back
Raelza raises her sword. Kisurugi steps on her shadow. She freezes.
Kisurugi charges. An arrow flies, striking his shoulder.
The dwarf magician. Raelza and Saito stare.
Lafa and Primasse battle
Morlcok hobbles through the crevice. Dwarf magician reloads his crossbow.
Kisurugi runs to the dwarf. He steps off Raelza's shadow, and she stumbles.
A fireball flies at Kisurugi
Explosion and darkness. Kisurugi darts away.
Primasse follows
Dwarf stares at Morlock. He approaches and bows.
Morlock gasps. Raelza, Saito, and Lafa stare.
Text, To be continued!

Post-episode footnote: The episode featured a diagram of character's faces, roles, and levels. The characters are as follows: Raelza, Knight, Level 46. Saito, Thief, Level 14. Morlock, Magician, Level 84. Lafanpan, Magician, Level 39. Guivre, Thief, Level 40. Liliza, Warrior, Level 47. Golden Armored Disguised Demon King, Magic Warrior, Level 76, Dropped Out. Minister, Magician, Level 80, Dropped Out. Power Wizard, Magician, Level 64, Not Participating. Raichee, Magician, Level 31. Cainz, Warrior, Level 32. Monpui, Priest, Level 28. Flanlil, Warrior, Level 44. Ninia, Priest, Level 35. Primasse, Magician, Level 50. Kisurugi, Ninja, Level 68.
